alert.note: Alert for South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:26PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sioux County through 215 PM MDT... At 126 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southwest of Agate Bed National Monument, or 15 miles northeast of Torrington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Sioux County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
